java/liquibase/CompositeFileOpener.java

00001 package liquibase;
00002 
00003 import java.io.IOException;
00004 import java.io.InputStream;
00005 import java.net.URL;
00006 import java.util.*;
00007 
00014 public class CompositeFileOpener implements FileOpener {
00015     List<FileOpener> openers;
00016 
00023     public CompositeFileOpener(List<FileOpener> openers) {
00024         this.openers = openers;
00025     }
00026 
00032     public CompositeFileOpener(FileOpener... openers) {
00033         this.openers = Arrays.asList(openers);
00034     }
00035 
00042     public InputStream getResourceAsStream(String file) throws IOException {
00043         for (FileOpener o : openers) {
00044             InputStream is = o.getResourceAsStream(file);
00045             if (is != null)
00046                 return is;
00047         }
00048         return null;
00049     }
00050 
00056     public Enumeration<URL> getResources(String packageName) throws IOException {
00057         for (FileOpener o : openers) {
00058             Enumeration<URL> e = o.getResources(packageName);
00059             if (e.hasMoreElements())
00060                 return e;
00061         }
00062         return new Vector<URL>().elements();
00063     }
00064 
00065     public ClassLoader toClassLoader() {
00066         List<ClassLoader> classLoaders = new ArrayList<ClassLoader>();
00067         for (FileOpener fo: openers) {
00068             classLoaders.add(fo.toClassLoader());
00069         }
00070 
00071         return new CompositeClassLoader(classLoaders.toArray(new ClassLoader[classLoaders.size()]));
00072     }
00073 
00074     //based on code from http://fisheye.codehaus.org/browse/xstream/trunk/xstream/src/java/com/thoughtworks/xstream/core/util/CompositeClassLoader.java?r=root
00075     private static class CompositeClassLoader extends ClassLoader {
00076 
00077         private final List<ClassLoader> classLoaders = new ArrayList<ClassLoader>();
00078 
00079         public CompositeClassLoader(ClassLoader... classLoaders) {
00080             this.classLoaders.addAll(Arrays.asList(classLoaders));
00081         }
00082 
00083         public Class loadClass(String name) throws ClassNotFoundException {
00084             for (Object classLoader1 : classLoaders) {
00085                 ClassLoader classLoader = (ClassLoader) classLoader1;
00086                 try {
00087                     return classLoader.loadClass(name);
00088                 } catch (ClassNotFoundException notFound) {
00089                     // ok.. try another one
00090                 }
00091             }
00092 
00093             // One last try - the context class loader associated with the current thread. Often used in j2ee servers.
00094             // Note: The contextClassLoader cannot be added to the classLoaders list up front as the thread that constructs
00095             // liquibase is potentially different to thread that uses it.
00096             ClassLoader contextClassLoader = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader();
00097             if (contextClassLoader != null) {
00098                 return contextClassLoader.loadClass(name);
00099             } else {
00100                 throw new ClassNotFoundException(name);
00101             }
00102 
00103 
00104         }
00105 
00106         }
00107 }
